data.actual_result: the profile view doesn't contain server-specific information, i.e. roles are missing and the server-specific name is switched for the regular Discord name
data.expected_result: The same profile view should open as if you were to click their name anywhere else on the server
data.short_description: server-specific information is missing when you click their picture in a collapsed categoy
data.steps_to_repro: - Collapes a category with a voice channel that has people chatting - click on any one of the people in the voice channel
